title: Jr. Software Engineer
description:
Contributed to the design, development, and maintenance of web-based applications using Node.js and MongoDB.
 • Collaborated with frontend team to deliver features on time.
 • Implemented REST APIs and backend logic, Resolved bugs, optimized queries, and performed regular code refactoring for better maintainability.

title: Backend Developer
description:
Designed and developed scalable RESTful APIs and  microservices using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB/SQL.
• Optimized server-side logic, database queries, resulting in reduced response times.
• Integrated third-party services, including payment gateways, authentication providers ( JWT), and cloud storage solutions (Azure).
• Implemented user authentication, authorization, and session management to enhance security across multiple applications.
•Collaborated with front-end developers,product managers,and stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver seamless user experiences.
•Developed database schemas, managed migrations, and wrote complex queries using Sequelize/Mongoose,ensuring data consistency and performance optimization.
•maintained high code quality through unit testing (Jest) .
•Monitored and maintained server infrastructure,troubleshooting and resolving issues .
• Key Technologies: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, SQL,Sequelize, REST APIs, Microservices, Git, JWT, Unit Testing(Jest,SonarQube),Azure Data Studio
